CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper November 7, 1953, pg. 36, reads: "Trick or Treat - Youthful Halloween celebrants didn't bypass the Centre Avenue Police Station in their trick-or-treat caravan last week, but they found the police officers ready for them.  Here is Sgt. Louis Dornetta passing out fruit and candy to neighborhood children."
TitMainTitle: Police Sergeant Louis Dornetta passing out candy to children in Halloween costumes in front of No. 2 police station, Centre Avenue, Hill District
